Course in PET and PET/CT imaging
This course is intended to thoroughly familiarize physician 
interested in PET and integrat ed imaging with PET/CT. The 
first part covers the technology basics and issues with patient 
handling are discussed. The second part focuses on body imaging, particulary for tumor staging, where the 
applications of PET and integrated PET/CT are clinically most relevant.
